t24:components.name: MI_BalanceMovementBuild

t24:applications.name: BALANCE_MOVEMENT
t24:applications.t24:allowed-functions: A B D E H I L P Q S V

t24:tooltip.t24:translation: Identifies the Customer for the transaction.
Indicates the date the Portfolios will be updated by the event
Indicates the current Balance of the Product
Indicates key to apply floating rate of interest
Transaction link reference of the contract

t24:applications.t24:short-description: Movements of Accounts/Contracts Updated Daily by STMT.ENTRY and RE.CONSOL.SPEC.ENTRY files

t24:components.t24:documentation: Building BALANCE.MOVEMENT file for contracts and accounts
